change flux in wavelength vs flux to other type. masses greater than 10^11. reshift bins 0-0.5-1.5-2-2.5. v-j vs u-v (shown in first paper). median glaxy wavelength (shown in first paper). combine all fields

z_mass
age_mass
sersic_mass
size_mass
sfr_mass
U_V
wavelength
	divide all wavelength values by (1+z)
	take out lines and put in symbols for points (look at paper she gave you)
	do median line
